title: Establishing a transatlantic platform for plant lipidomics
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Building a strong collaboration with colleagues in the US working in the field of plant lipidomics Agriculture, Food and Drink Societal
findingsText: We found new ways to look at the chemical composition of plants, yeast and algae. . Agriculture, Food and Drink
